item.title: Dragon Defender (Tru3Scape)
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Lmao…

if (itemUsed == 13598 && useWith 15187 || itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 13598) { if (playerLevel[3] >= 99) { if (playerHasItemAmount(6889, 1)) { deleteItem(13598, getItemSlot(13598), 1); deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1); setAnimation(1770); addItem(1215, 1); addSkillXP(100000, 3); sendMessage("You bind the visage to the defender."); } else if (playerHasItemAmount(6889, 1) == false) { sendMessage("You do not have a Mage Book in your inventory to bind them."); } else if (playerLevel[3] <= 98) { sendMessage("You do not have a high enough Magic level to bind these two items."); } } }

item.title: Dragon Defender (Tru3Scape)
item.dc:creator: @Jake_Ericson Jake Ericson
item.description:
@Jake_Ericson wrote:

[quote=“tru3 ki11a2, post:4, topic:180057”]Either, you used visage on black def (or vv). So in order for it to work is if you use the item 13598 on the item 15187.

PS- Did you have to put (Tru3Scape) after the title?[/quote]
Thank you! Someone actually helping instead of saying “LOL UR GUNAN GT MUTDE LOLOLOOLOLOL NUB!”

item.title: Dragon Defender (Tru3Scape)
item.dc:creator: @Jake_Ericson Jake Ericson
item.description:
@Jake_Ericson wrote:

I made it to where you use a Draconic Visage on a Black Defender while you had a mage book in inventory and you got a Dragon Dagger which I modded for defence bonus and it to be in sheild spot. I didn’t get any errors while compiling, but when I use black defender on visage nothing happens. Here is the code.

if((itemUsed == 13598 && useWith == 15187))
{
if(playerLevel[3] >= 99)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(6889, 1)==false)
{
sendMessage(“You do not have a Mage Book in your inventory to bind them
together.”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(6889, 1)==true) {
deleteItem(13598, getItemSlot(13598), 1);
deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
setAnimation(1770);
addItem(1215, 1);
addSkillXP(100000, 3);
sendMessage(“You bind the visage to the defender.”);’

It is put up right after the end of armor trimming. Sorry I didn’t know I can’t rep.

Read full topic
